website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy, fun, and worth its cost, this mini basketball set is best for older kids.
pros: Consumers love this model because its durable, tough, and holds up well over time
We love that it's easy to clean
cons: Though it is designed to be shatter-resistant, some experienced the backboard cracking
Included ball tends to be heavy

customer_reviews.title: The best and the worse gift I could have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: The best and the worse gift I could have ever bought! My son loves it and has been playing with it ever since he got it. We hooked it to his bedroom door. You should be asking yourself why did I say the worse gift if he loves it so much? Simple, because the only thing I hear in my house ever since we bought this is the bang bang bang bang noise of the ball against the floor and the door since he has not stopped playing! Good quality hook, the ball was perfect too. Really good durable product
customer_reviews.author: L. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: useless if i cant close the door..
customer_reviews.text: what the heck? what's the point of this if i cannot close my door? you can certainly flip the hoop to the opposite side of the door to face inside the room when door is closed but guess what...it hits the wall it opens to on all my doors. would be nice if the hoop folded up instead of damaging walls. no idea where to put this now. decent quality but the spring tension is super tight, if you think about touching the rim when you attempt a dunk it'll break the thin backboard. barely worth $20
customer_reviews.author: CupOfRamen

customer_reviews.title: Its an awesome size and the quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Its an awesome size and the quality is amazing, but because there is no support on the bottom of the backboard, it gets very loud. Because I am in an apartment complex the downstairs neighbors complain because they think I am putting holes in the wall. I tried taping the backboard to the door but that still didn't help. My solution for this was to get a soft foam ball, but it would be much nicer with more support to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: A fun backboard/rim for the price. Foam backing all around the board and the hooks helps protect the door or whatever you hang it on. The rim is metal and mounted with springs. The net is sturdy and hooks onto 10 or 12 hooks on the rim. The worst aspect of the set is the ball--quite heavy and hard. Super loud in the house.
customer_reviews.author: ride

customer_reviews.title: Look before you gift.
customer_reviews.text: BE CAREFUL AND MAKE AURE YOU GOT WHAT YOU ORDERED BEFORE YOU GIFT IT!!! Was supposed to be the skilz brand. When we opened the box we got the sportcraft brand. No door hangers, no mini basketball, very cheap. Completely ruined our little boys Easter as this was a easter bunny gift. We re-evaluate once I get the real deal. They better refund it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Update to original review. After 5 months the plastic cracked near where the rim attached. The plastic is too thin and didnt last. This basketball goal seems a lot more flimsy then the one we had before that broke. The previous one had a sturdier backboard and the spring allowed the rim to bend down easier. The backboard on this one bends every time you hit the rim at all and the spring seems really stiff which increases how much the back bends. Hopefully the high reviews on this are correct and it lasts. I will update review after the kids get some more dunks on it.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: NOT what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Basically it LOOKS good, but then it ends there. The frames door hinges/hooks are over-sized, and prevents you from closing the door securing it in place. They don't provide you FULL DISCLOSURE of the COMPLETE measurements of EVERY LITTLE DETAIL....but in the end I took a chance anyway for the price. In a nut shell the board wobbles all over the place because it can't be secured firmly by closing your/MY door properly. My door(s) in the house and their frames are a very snug fit. You'll need to check the thickness and the spacing of your doors before purchasing. I'll just figure something out over the coming days and go from there.
customer_reviews.author: The Myth

customer_reviews.title: This is well made. The backboard and hoop are ...
customer_reviews.text: This is well made. The backboard and hoop are solidly built. We use it on our trampoline. Much cheaper than the big gaughty pricey hoops "made for trampolines".
customer_reviews.author: oldtimehockey

customer_reviews.title: Amazon delivery is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This game is only one example of the efficiency of Amazon. Amazon availability has changed my life for the better. Today, though I was made to "jump" hoops for an hour, as I got a series of many times repeated messages: "my password is wrong" (not true), enter row of digits; now we will send you a code; enter the code, Your password is wrong, change your password, you can't change your cell phone address. Something really bad is going on with this system.
customer_reviews.author: Max Lubach

customer_reviews.title: better than what i had growing up | nostalgia galore | great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I suggest removing hooks and apply directly (flush) against a wall or door for optimal play other wise many bounces will not go your way rim will shake quite a bit and backboard will be unstable. i got this on sale and recommend if and when its under $20 easy to assemble and packaged well. ball is sturdy net will sometimes come off during play but can be easily modded to stay put. fun times and nostalgia galore
customer_reviews.author: Jpix

customer_reviews.title: Good quality hoop!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and much better than any that I have purchased before. The only issue I had (and it’s not a product issue but rather a shipping issue) was that it was not delivered in a box so my son saw this sitting on the porch when he got home from school (was supposed to be for Christmas) and when I went to pick it up to bring it into the house the whole packaging was cut open. Luckily all pieces were there and nothing was damaged so no need to return it and my son was pretty happy he got an early gift!
customer_reviews.author: Mickeybeyes

customer_reviews.title: good product, but the ball isn't really a good ball for indoors
customer_reviews.text: The backboard is nice, but the ball, however, is way to hard to be used indoors..it's like a real basketball, just smaller. this would be great, if i put this in a basement or whatever, but in my tiny little office, the ball is way too bouncy, too loud, and will definitely break something if i'm not careful. also, my doors are about 1.25" thick, and the hangers on the backboard need to be shimmed, they're designed for a thicker door. i ordered the foam ball from the same company. probably would have given 5 stars if i had the option to get the foam ball instead of the inflatable.
customer_reviews.author: tim K

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES, LOVES, LOVES this basketball hoop set!!! His only complaint was that the hoop itself is a bit smaller than he expected, but overall, this was a fantastic buy! Great price n great quality! He hung it over the door as soon as it arrived n uses it daily!!! He's 12 too, so you know it must be a great product if he's using it so much! He even slam dunks n everything n it's still in perfect shape! Your child/children n their friends will not be disappointed n it's entertaining for them, especially when quarantined n dodging Coronavirus! 😉🤣😂😁
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Cromlish

customer_reviews.title: Durable backboard but net not as pictured.  Not UV stable
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this outdoors under a full-sized backboard/goal. It is tough. When you shoot a full-sized ball through the 10-foot high rim about 1/3 of the time the ball will land on the mini rim underneath. It's been 6 months and there is no sign of this thing breaking. When you shoot a small ball through the upper net you can even score 4 points sometimes with one shot. Unfortunately the net has not lasted. It has pretty much disintegrated in the sun. That wouldn't be so bad but I can't find a six-loop net anywhere. The pictures here show 8-loop rims but it actually only has 6 loops. I guess I'll either learn to weave or do without.
customer_reviews.author: Kyleike

customer_reviews.title: My son and I love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son because he broke our prior indoor hoop and we needed a more durable basket that would hold up over time. I also put one of these together for my nephew several months ago, and I really liked the professional look and play of it, which is why I chose to get one for our household as well. The real-play feel is addicting, and I find myself wanting to play just as much as my son (if not more) at times. It takes some patience putting it together, but it's well worth it. It's durable, very realistic in terms of play, and a ton of fun. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Hopson

customer_reviews.title: Easy install! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my son's old basketball hoop set that was exactly the same size and brand except not glow in the dark because the backboard broke. Installation was fairly easy to do, only took a few minutes, my only complaint is the glow in the dark mini basketball would not hold air so he used the basketball from his old set. The hoop rim is very sturdy and has a metal spring which is pretty sturdy for mini dunks. The backboard is hard plastic. My son enjoys this set likes playing with it on rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: super durable, for indoor use i would recommend ordering softer ball for it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son but honestly my husband and his brothers have played with it just as much! LOL I will say that i am not a fan of the ball it comes with....not for indoors anyways.... its very hard. It really reminds me of a true basketball with how hard it is! if you were putting this outside or in the garage or something, then that ball would be good.... but we ordered the "POOF 4 Inch Pro Mini Basketball" along with this and that is the ball we use for it in the house, and it works perfect! This hoop seems super durable and i am sure it will be used for many many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Really fun and great present for the kids to play on a cold or rainy day. The best part about it is that it has foam all around it so the are no marks left on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Nick DavisTop Contributor: Minecraft

customer_reviews.title: Semi glows
customer_reviews.text: My son was ecstatic to have the overdoor basket hoop for his room. Surprised him him the glow in the dark set as it something to show off to his friends. We set it up at night so only the net had a little glow. Next day we put it in the window so that the backboard lights up. Nothing. Not even a little. The net glowed better than the 1st night but that was it. Im disappointed as I paid more for the glow feature rather than buying cheaper item. If my son wasn't autistic and had major meltdowns over having gifts taken away I would send this back to atleast attempt to exchange it for 1 that works.
customer_reviews.author: camille danquah

customer_reviews.title: Be sure you have a place to use it.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is my fault, but if the hoop would "fold up" then you could actually use it inside a bedroom. However, it must be installed on the "inside" of a door, but then you cannot open the door all the way (or else you might put a hole in your wall!). Where does a person actually use such a thing? If you have a closet in your bedroom with a regular door, then you can use it...otherwise, no. It should come with a way to attach it to a wall instead. Anyway, make sure you have a place to use it before you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this hoop for our oldest son for his room and he LOVES IT!! Took us a few minutes to put together and the tiny basic wrench they provide does NOT work! You will need another wrench of your own! Very durable. Solid. Great quality. Not flimsy like cheap ones, but a good, strong hoop! Metals hooks to hang tight on the doors. The basketball comes deflated and you will need a pump with a basketball pin (it doesn’t have either). My son thinks he’s Michael Jordan and my husband thinks he’s LeBron James now! Whatever makes them happy! Lol All in all, it’s a wonderful hoop! Absolutely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great Version of Classic- Kids and Dad love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and easy to assemble. I would dare call this a heavy duty item. Has some weight to it which helps keep it from moving when shooting the authentic feeling ball. Hung in kids room and they love it. The support brackets at the top of the door is a little wide for the door which does allow it some give but isn't bad. Would recommend to anyone looking for a sturdy version of this classic. Note- With the 'authentic' feel ball, backboard and heavy rim, this can be quite noisy.
customer_reviews.author: James Crampton

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit but not what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit but not what it says it is. The blow definitely glows and glows bright but nothing else glows as they claim. Also, the spring on the hoop is way too strong to flex down. In fact, the entire plexiglas board would flex and I expect even break before the spring would compress even a little. So NO the ring doesn't move. If a child was to pull on the hoop the plexiglas will break before the spring would do anything. My kid still likes it but was disappointed it didn't glow in the dark as the package claims.
customer_reviews.author: Abzman

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely nice, especially for the price. It is of a quality that would seem like it would be over $30. It's solid, the rim is metal and it has a nice spring in the rim. It rattles a lot on the door that we have it on so we just put a small cloth behind the backboard and it solves that issue. Also, that issue wouldn't be unique to this product, all hoops like this have a similar issue. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I wish the plexi would be more bigger and sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice, and it is a lot of fun. Price is about right, but I suggest lo look for a lower deal. I wouldn't pay an extra tenth for this. Back board is short and flimsy. Short with respect to rim, angle shots aiming to board are impossible to make, they hit the edge or corner of board. I hung it up on wall on top of a door. For that you have to be creative and handy. Hanging it from door might not allow door to be closed. Having to remove it every time you need... Last thing... Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Indoor Basketball over the door Hoop
customer_reviews.text: Great product, sturdy and my boy can finally be active indoors!!! The only problem was that I had to find other nuts to attach hoop to the board. The ones that were supplied had round semi-sphere top that could not be secured and tightened. Luckily I had some at my home in the same diameter and was able to tighten it with included wrench and nuts. I want to use it same day and we did! It's noisy now, the only complain, but my boy is jumping, dunking and active and that's what matters!!!
customer_reviews.author: Irina G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing basketball hoop, very durrable!
customer_reviews.text: Amaze basketball hoop. I bought this because I needed a trampoline basketball hoop, and all the ones made for trampolines seemed like junk. So we welded a frame. Drilled on the basketball hoop. And put everything back together and hooked it up on my trampoline. And now it works better than any trampoline basketball hoop I have EVER used. I love it so much, would really recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Go Mom Go

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed :/
customer_reviews.text: We have this hoop at home for our kids and my husband wanted one for work. I surprised him with one but was disappointed to see that, although the hoop was the same, we were given a knockoff basketball. The original (bottom one pictured) is sturdy, bounces well, good quality and has the trademark logo w yellow in it as pictured in the listing...while the ball we were given (top one pictured) is rubbery, slightly smaller, doesn’t air up well and doesn’t have the same logo or texture to it. This is the first time I’ve had an issue w Amazon sending an item that is not as advertised and I’m bummed it happened on a gifted item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son loves this, it's hanging on the door of his closet in his bedroom. I bought the foam ball separately after reading reviews that the inflatable one it comes with leaves marks on the walls, and believe it was a good choice as we've been using the foam ball since day 1 and no issues with marks on the walls. The goal itself is very durable and has held up well! It is a bit loud when the ball hits it but nothing you can do about that really.
customer_reviews.author: John Pizarro

customer_reviews.title: Nice inside hoop
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted to get a hoop for our son like what he had when he was a kid. He thought this was too fancy, even though it's not very expensive. He wanted one of those cardboard backboard with a sponge like basketball and a plastic hoop. This has a sturdy backboard, ball and hoop. The ball is not a ball that needs to be pumped with air, which I prefer. Our kids like to jump off the bed to dunk the ball and its held up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hoop!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, high quality mini hoop with a great color scheme. The rim is solid and the padding on the back of the backboard makes it sit quietly on the door and limits any bouncing. The plastic of the backboard is a little thin, but that is really the only slight critique I could come up with. If your looking for a durable and unique mini-hoop this one is a good choice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Backboard is flimsy and makes a terrible sound when using it
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that the backboard on this unit was going to be solid, but instead it's a limp piece of plastic. Whenever you hit the backboard when trying to shoot, the backboard makes the worst sound whenever it's hit by a ball. The sound is so loud my kids don't like to play with the unit. We're really disappointed in the SKLZ Pro Mini Basketball Hoop. The ball is fine, actually using the ball with the backboard is a drag. The breakaway rim is nice, but unless you can swish each shot on this hoop, I'd find another product to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Gafford

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, bigger than average door model
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy hoop. It was a bit too loose on our doors, causing it to bang around too much, especially since it is heavier than smaller hoops. My son has been using a much lighter/smaller ball than it came with, as that one seems far to heavy to throw around in his room. Maybe it would work for a much more open space, but not his small bedroom. I removed the door brackets and attached to the wall. The rim is heavy, so if the ball hits it it still makes the whole thing bang a bit. I will try adding another screw or something to the bottom to secure it better.
customer_reviews.author: JDDPTA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old grandson to use in their shop area. I looked and looked for an over the door basketball goal that was of good quality, not something cheap that you may get for a younger child. This goal is very well made and sturdy. After reading reviews, I also bought a couple of the foam basketballs as many reviews stated the basketball that came with it made too much noise and was too hard. Those reviews were right! Would highly recommend to others looking for a good quality basketball goal....but purchase some foam balls to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma 2 four

customer_reviews.title: **JUNK** Flimsy backboard - breaks in weeks
customer_reviews.text: What is the best part of a mini hoop? Dunking. What happens if you dunk on this PoS? The spring is completely wrong for the flimsy backboard. Every time you dunk the rim will flex instead of spring. The backboard will snap quickly. There was no hanging on the rim just dunking by an 80 lb child. Why is it so hard to build a properly designed product in 2020?? Thicker plexi and a weaker spring would make this a quality product instead of a PoS.
customer_reviews.author: J. Astuccio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Office Hoop
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my new office, I wanted something not super bright but still fun to play with and this is a hit. It matches the black furniture in the office and is a wonderful conversation starter. The balls are a little cheap, but that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Potter

customer_reviews.title: sturdy product, but doesn't function well on door
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy product that looks great, but... The door hanger hooks were too large for all of my doors inside. I used wood pieces to problem solve for this issue, but the bottom half of the setup is so heavy b/c of the rim/hoop assembly and the backboard is fairly flimsy it creates a lot of movement whenever the ball hits the rim. This creates a lot of noise and makes the whole assembly bounce against the door. I tried to solve this issue by looping a ratchet strap around the door and over the bottom of the backboard, but this still doesn't totally eliminate the nose and bouncing.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.M

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, but slam dunking and shooting makes noise!
customer_reviews.text: Our elementary school and middle school age boys were trying to build their own out of cans, cardboard, and duct tape. This was a good compromise. They love it and use it all the time. I mean ALL the time. The noise from slam dunking is annoying, but I can't imagine a silent version of this. We ended up adding some padding between the door and the mounting hooks to get a more secure fit with less vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Another great game for eye hand coordination.
customer_reviews.text: Another great game for eye hand coordination. My four-year-old niece loves this basketball goal she’s not tall enough to really bounce the ball and get it in very well but if she stands and throws she gets quite a few in the net. And she’s very happy when she does that.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A. Silverstrim

customer_reviews.title: Backboard too flexible for use
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great hoop at first. It is ok to assemble and hangs on door firmly. However the backboard is plexiglass and very thin so it flexes a lot then the ball hits it causing the backboard to be almost useless for scoring. “Nothing but net” is the only way to be effective. For kids learning, this is useless me frustrating. I will try to blister the back with something rigid and see if this helps. I shouldn’t need to do this though. It avoided 1 Star due to being clean, nice looking, and coming with an appropriate sized ball.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love the backboard
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one of these. We finally broke the first one after maybe five years of solid use. The one we broke was the small standard one. Not sure which I prefer. I like the look of the bigger one but the backboard flexes more as it has more weight and you get more leverage when slamming and grabbing the rim. What happens is the backboard actually flexes instead of the rim. We'll see how long this one lasts. Love the ball it comes with. Wish I could get more 5.5" balls or wish it came with two.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jackson

customer_reviews.title: It broke again
customer_reviews.text: My kids get these and treat them well, like kids. They want to dunk on it. It's pretty much a given, right? Problem is the backboard cracks. One once that happens it is ruined because it hangs off and it cannot be dunked on any longer. They are cheap either. You probably are stuck buying this or something like it if the kids are insisting on it. But don't expect it to last too long.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Guile

customer_reviews.title: but the kids still love it. We're on our third backboard
customer_reviews.text: This product is not shatter proof; but the kids still love it. We're on our third backboard. The boys (18 and 12) get a bit too carried away, but they spend countless hours playing with it in their room. The older one is going to need one for his dorm in college. This is an excellent concept and product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kline

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: We got it for my daughter for her birthday and she loves it! All of the kids go into her room to play. It's super sturdy, and well made, and the ball is really bouncy which makes it really fun! It's provided hours of entertainment during this quarantine. I would also get some sort of pad to put on the wall--it sticks out pretty far and will most definitely punch a hole in a wall behind your door.
customer_reviews.author: mom2twins+1

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Product but Easy to Break
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old son. This is actually the second time that I am purchasing a product like this because the one I bought before this broke as well! I was hoping that this would last at least a year, but it broke in almost a month! I don't think it was rough handled too much either. The rim was perfectly fine, but the backboard came clean off. I am definitely glad he did not get hurt, but the durability of the backboard needs to be improved. While it lasted, the glow in the dark feature was actually really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh Srinivasa

customer_reviews.title: ... for about a month now and it has been great! I was surprised at the nice quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: We've owned this basketball hoop for about a month now and it has been great! I was surprised at the nice quality of the board and mini basketball it included. The board has foam backing so it doesn't damage your door which is great! The included mini basketball will need to be pumped with air so be sure you have a ball pump on hand. The included ball is about as legit as it can get! It even bounces really well too! We also use a foam ball from a different basketball goal we had and that works well too. We love this basketball goal!
customer_reviews.author: PandaMolanda

customer_reviews.title: Did not glow in the dark as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointing with this hoop. The main reasons I purchased the hoop, rather than other similar items, was that glowed in the dark. neither the hoop nor the ball glowed in the dark. If I was buying something that did not glow in the dark, I would say its a very nice toy. But since it was advertised as such, and since I told my son that's what I was buying for him. He was very disjointed the first night he got it, when it did not glow.This was his 4th birthday party gift from his grandfather.
customer_reviews.author: mcamaj

customer_reviews.title: Thin, flimsy backboard and thin-walled ball
customer_reviews.text: The rim and net are nicely made, but we were shocked that the backboard is so thin. I had figured it would be more substantial. The ball also surprised us--it has very thin skin. Simply be aware of these factors. All in all, it likely will hold up fine under light use, which probably explains the overall decent reviews. I'm not sure how well the hoop will fare with my high-energy family.
customer_reviews.author: Gw

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic flimsy material
customer_reviews.text: Just look at the photo. I applied no significant pressure and the backboard plexiglass flexes 3-4 inches. The rim, which has a built in spring, is rendered useless because the plastic backboard would break before the spring would begin to compress. Every shot off the backboard wobbles the entire goal and it’s so loud you’d assume you were destroying it. The ball and rim are quality. Unfortunately they are effectively useless because the clear plastic backboard makes the entire thing useless. I’d rather mount the rim and brackets on a piece of plywood... which I intend to do.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Birchler

customer_reviews.title: The best basketball door hoop
customer_reviews.text: This has been my 12 year old's favorite Christmas present. It was easy to put together. It has springs so it won't break and it has received a lot of dunking! I love hearing my son shooting hoops in his room, which means he's not always gaming! It's a good way to let off some steam and move around while taking a break from homework. Great price and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: carlamar

customer_reviews.title: Surprised and impressed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an Amazon deal. It was a great price so I gave it to my son as a bday gift. I was surprised by the great quality of the product. Two months later and I'm blown away that he's still playing with this daily. He said it was his favorite gift! Who knew?!👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: GRA2B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little basketball hoop to hang over the door we got it for our 10-year-old who plays PS4 NBA 2020 and then relax everything he sees on the set I just purchased another one because we left ours in a storage unit and found out they make an extra large unit which allows the rim to be about 4 inches lower that’s allowing him to slam the ball great buy works great.
customer_reviews.author: Papa TTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: ... the easiest instructions to understand but the assembly is pretty straight forward
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest instructions to understand but the assembly is pretty straight forward. The net works on most of my doors but only on facing inside the rooms. When I try to flip it to the outside of the door the backboard prevents the door from closing. The ball is great but a little bit heavy so it could knock some things over.
customer_reviews.author: ktyas31

customer_reviews.title: While i hate how it sounds like a heard of elephants are ...
customer_reviews.text: While i hate how it sounds like a heard of elephants are living above me, my son gets hours of enjoyment out of this mini hoop. This is a good size, in fact it’s the width of the door frame. Seems pretty solid. Holding up perfectly so far. Would recommend to other basketball lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Huck

customer_reviews.title: ball is lyfe
customer_reviews.text: Windmill jams. Alley oops. Fade-away jumpers. Corporate life is so much better now. I will note that the rubber ball that comes with the hoop is quite loud when shooting so it may be worth purchasing a lighter nerf ball as well. The hoop fits over my office door but the door doesn't shut all the way now. Not a big deal for me since my walls are paper thin anyways but worth noting. Ceiling fire sprinklers beware!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Williams

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: If you're wanting to mount this to a wall, you can! Because of the width you're more than likely not going to hit studs in your wall on each end. We mounted one side into a stud and used a heavy duty drywall anchor for the other side. Our 11 yr old has been playing with this for months now & we've had no issues. And best part, no noise!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Everything about it is high quality and a steal at the price. The only down side is that it doesn’t work well with my office door which is extremely tall and too tight at the top of the door jam. It fits the door fine but the door won’t close. Perhaps I just need a new job? Think it will work fine on home door jam and I have a friend who plans to use theirs on their patio.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun, could be more durable.
customer_reviews.text: My 12yr old son loved this and played with it almost daily. We hung it from his bedroom door but now wishing we mounted it on the wall. After a year the backboard cracked and it slowly spread. Now it's falling apart. He was not overly hard on it or slam dunking on it. Hanging over the door, it just doesn't have the support it needs to sit securely in place.
customer_reviews.author: Savy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: No pump?! What am I gonna do with a pancake?
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great hoop, looks pro, sturdy and clean. Cons: Comes with a deflated ball? And no pump? Come on man! Sorry guys, but I’d have still bought this for $4.00 more if it said it came with a pump for the dang ball! Anyway, again, great quality product all around but if you buy this, get a pump or play with a pancake.
customer_reviews.author: Disintegrator

customer_reviews.title: This is really fun and clips over a door.
customer_reviews.text: It does make some noise when the ball goes through but my kids are having a great time with this. After getting it we are ordering more balls, so this may be something to consider while buying. We put it in my 12 year old daughter's room for Christmas. Fun for all of us, that's why we need more balls. Sturdy and well made, worth the price. Does not attach to a door though only hangs over a door so I added some foam/double stick tape underneath the back board against the wall to make it bounce less and make less noise.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fetko

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son originally had one of the cheap very flimsy hoops like this. After he destroyed that one I wanted to find a new one that would last. It has been a lot of fun and is holding up well. We have it hung above a 9 foot door so we simply shoot the ball at it and don't do a lot of dunking. My son plays with it daily and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Never received this product
customer_reviews.text: Never received the product. Tracking stuck on “undeliverable” but still haven’t received a refund after several weeks. Tried to return and still nothing... this was a terrible experience. I do want to point out that I bought the XL version of this and I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT.. it’s super dope.. durable. Nice and flexible rim for (non excessive) light dunking!! Feels real and the backboard feels very authentic. Perfect for indoor play!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yeli Dinero

customer_reviews.title: A satisfying indoor basketball set
customer_reviews.text: Accept no other. Paid for mine. Been over a year and love it. Durable, easy to clean and looks nice. We have switched out the ball that came with it for a couple that are more like the Nerf type - they still work well together. A really well made product, especially if you can catch on sale for $20. If you love your kids , your partner or yourself - save your pennies for this and not the cheap stuff.
customer_reviews.author: me!

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: This hoop set is great. It is well made and can withstand a bunch of 10-year-olds dunking the ball. I would have given it 5 stars, but this hoop set needs to be placed on a very heavy door and not a closet or bedroom door. The typical closet door is not very thick and this hoop set is very heavy in comparison to other sets. Again, this is a great set, just a little too heavy for a typical closet or bedroom door.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Why put a "slam jam" rim on such poor backboard material
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last more than a week with my 8 and 11 year old boys. After the first one broke, SKLZ replaced it under warranty but accused us of hanging on the rim when that isn't how the backboard broke. The second one lasted less than a week before breaking. Why put a "slam jam" rim on such poor backboard material? Even without hanging on it, it can't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: RevRun Regan

customer_reviews.title: Broke in one week!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. My son had this for a week and it broke. The spring is supposed to take pressure off the backboard, but it doesn't. The backboard snapped in half.
customer_reviews.author: S. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rim with a good backboard
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rim with a good backboard. The rim on this basketball hoop is amazing. I expect that long after the backboard is gone I will use the rim on a home made backboard. While the backboard isn’t bad, it does flex some more than I would like, it just isn’t nearly as great as the rim which seems as though my son could hang on it if the Back board was more rigid. Overall a great hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Christian B.

customer_reviews.title: Ball is missing, screws missing, no means to contact directly via Amazon click
customer_reviews.text: Ball is missing, screws missing, no means to contact directly via Amazon click, link provided is down, have to call 8-5 PM on weekdays? Now I am waiting to see if they answer the phone. Most likely will return This is a nice product and return and replace process appears to work well. Return and replace was very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Bookem

customer_reviews.title: Backboard broke within a month, non existent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product is real fun for the kids, until it breaks. After that i tried to reach the customer service through email as well as the number provided on the website, but i couldn't reach them at all. Luckily i was still within the return period and hence initiated the return.Now i am looking for a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons

customer_reviews.title: Durable and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This backboard system has taken many dunks from my kids and is holding up nicely. It looks to be made with good materials and is nice looking...as far as backboards go. It has foam pads on the back to protect the door it rests on, but it still scratches the door's paint a little. Honestly, I am not sure how it would not scratch the paint considering the force it takes from repeated dunks.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Washington

customer_reviews.title: Indoor Balling!
customer_reviews.text: This SKLZ Pro Mini Basketball Hoop is a great piece of equipment. This is my 15-year old son's 5th one over the past 5 years. The quality is great! The reason I have had to purchase so many is because my son's friends tend to forget that it is not a real basketball hoop and try to dunk on it; thereby, breaking it! Otherwise, I highly recommend this basketball hoop for indoors.
customer_reviews.author: MThomas2GA

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t come incognito.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure we will like the product, but I’m questioning why In the world this was delivered around xmas time without being concealed? It was delivered this morning and I’m glad I saw it before my son did, or else this wouldn’t be such a great Xmas surprise, right?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent if on sale
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the mini version of the hoop. Assembly was pretty straightforward and simple although it was a little annoying using the small wrench that comes in the box. The quality of the metal rim seems pretty good, although the net seems to be fraying a little and the plastic backboard is kind of flimsy. The foam ball is the reason why I got the mini version and the outer coating seems to be peeling and I haven't even used it much. Overall it's still a pretty fun toy to mess around with time to time. If you can get it on sale for around $15 then I would say its a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Durable product, great price
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son has used it almost everyday for 3 months and we haven't had a problem with it. Good quality and great price. The ball that comes with it is starting to show some wear as far as the top layer of the ball flaking off but this is normal with any foam ball after repeated use. No complaints and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A E

customer_reviews.title: A must have at my house!
customer_reviews.text: We have had these in our home for years! My sons get new ones every year...they thoroughly enjoy playing on them, as do their friends. They are really a lot more sturdy and well manufactured than my review would imply. My boys and friends usually perform a lot of monster dunks on them and that’s why there’s the need to replace them yearly.
customer_reviews.author: NyBeNy

customer_reviews.title: Deflated Ball & Tricky To Put Together
customer_reviews.text: My son selected this product because he wanted a basketball hoop in his room. It works really well but it came with a deflated ball (which makes sense). We don't seem to have a ball pump at home so will have to get one in order to use the included basketball. Both my high school and college sons said theirs (they each have one) were a bit hard to put together. Once together, it works well and is pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: V. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: SO LOUD and cannot CLOSE the door.
customer_reviews.text: The other reviewers are not wrong when they say, it is loud (Construction site loud)! The main problem is the thin plexiglass cannot handle the heaviness of metal hoop and it buckles with any touch. Also, the hooks do not fit on a standard door, 1" gap! Cannot close the door. NOT RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: BirdingIt

customer_reviews.title: My son is driving me crazy with this lol
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. The ball is pretty hard so when it hit the backboard it makes tons of noise. It’s kind of off putting if you don’t know what is going on. We have been startled several times. He loves it so I guess that’s all that matters. I just wish there was a way for it to be less noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it, dad likes it.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it: Pros: Solid adjustable rim Sturdy over-the-door brackets Cons: Backboard is too flexible (we've installed heavy duty Velcro at both bottom corners to keep the backboard from "bouncing" when the ball hits the rim. This solved the problem, but we do have the fuzzy side of the Velcro on the door when we take down the backboard. NOT A PRODUCT PROBLEM, BUT BE AWARE: Make sure you install this on the outside of an inward swinging door. It'll bash the heck out of a wall if hung on the inward swinging side of the door.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: love this! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble. Bigger then what I expected. Love that it glows in the dark. The ball does too. My nephew plays on this thing everyday. Its been about 3 weeks and its still hanging in there lol :) I thought the price was a little steep but realized it was worth it once I saw the size and how happy he was.
customer_reviews.author: Mishon

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it! Very durable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing! He had an old one for about 3 years before the rim broke. After researching several different ones, I decided on trying this one. I thought the price was pretty reasonable. So far it has held up nicely, and that says something. He plays hours on this thing a day! He’s always dunking, and swishing hard on it. So far, still good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a joke for my husband but we actually both have a lot of fun with it. It feels very official and looks nice. I will have to say, it is pretty loud like some of the other reviews mention. We did not have any issue fitting it over our door or closing the door with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Emily P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent indoor option
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact that it does not allow the door to close shut with just a nudge...this is a good option. Your door will shut you will have to guide it all the way. If you kid is under 4.5 feet, and your door is at least 11 feet, this works great. For taller kids or shorter doors, the hoop is too low or small. Quality is great. Our boy spends hours with it. If you do not mind the thumping inside the house, your kid will leave you alone and play with this for hours :-)
customer_reviews.author: Smart Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this for my daughter who was super excited when it arrived(as all the gyms and playgrounds are closed). I was a little disappointed that she had to wait 3 extra days to play with it as I had to order a ball pump for the deflated ball. Overall I like the hoop, just wish it came with a pump.
customer_reviews.author: DWright

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: My eight year old LOVES basketball. He'd sleep with his basketball if we let him so this was the perfect purchase when the elements outside prevent him from shooting hoops. This thing is sturdy as my son dunks on it with his friends constantly. Way better than those nerf ones as this is bigger. All around great purchase. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The basketball hoop was easy to put together. The material was sturdy and feels like it would last a while. The one problem is the base of the hoop has no way to secure it so when the ball hits it, there is a lot of bouncing of the hoop. If there was an extra strap to secure the lower part of the hoop, I think this product would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: P. G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this set. He plays with it throughout the day, every day. It is very sturdy and the material is not cheap like some of the others. The ball is also a little harder than the cheap ones but a standard size. He can use a softer one when we are worried about the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Kd

customer_reviews.title: Terrible to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The supplied wrench was absolutely terrible. The manufacturer could easily have spent Just 5 cents more per wrench and supplied the customer with a tool that works well and is not, truly, infuriating. Took 15 minutes to attach the rim with 3 bolts since the wrench is nearly worthless. Also, it does not come with the tool needed to take off the door mount, also ridiculous. That little hex key costs a few cents each, why not include it?
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fold
customer_reviews.text: This hoop is great, really sturdy and fun for the kids. But it doesn't fold like our old one did, so it is really hard to store. If they could make it so the hoop flips up it would store almost flat but since the hoop is stuck in the position it's in, it makes it super hard to put away when you need to.
customer_reviews.author: LJMama

customer_reviews.title: Secondly as others have pointed out the ball that comes with is bad for indoor play
customer_reviews.text: First off the bolts that connect the rim to the backboard are too short. Tried 20 times and gave up will have to get my own bolts. Secondly as others have pointed out the ball that comes with is bad for indoor play. I got this for a very low price so Im less upset about having to order the $5 ball made of foam I can shoot freely without worrying about breaking half of my stuff. I plan on mounting this to the wall and I agree the over the door hanging system could be better as you can close many doors with it mounted.
customer_reviews.author: anthony c wiltshire

customer_reviews.title: Not very well made
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 11 year old... the backboard is super flimsy. The hoop has springs on it like a real goal.. however, they're useless because the entire backboard bends and arcs with any pressure at all to the front of the rim.. I guess we'll see how long it lasts..
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Grodecki

customer_reviews.title: built to have fun
customer_reviews.text: this thing can take a beating and still stay strong. we have had this for 6 months in my 8 yr old room and it gets worked on daily with slams and jams. Went through several cheap ones before deciding to spend more for a better one. paid 29.99 when I bought it and looks like it is on a great sale now. buy it - your basketball fan won't ask for more :)
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!! We have had a few versions of these over the years and this one was the most sturdy coming out of the package. And it has not disappointed in the 2 months we have had it! My 6 year old LOVES it! And we have gotten some great use out of it with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Has survived 4 years of hard use
customer_reviews.text: I just came on line to buy a replacement net and saw that it had been more than 4 years since I bought the hoop so I thought I would leave a review. My husband and now 12 year old son use this all the time and dunk on it hard, but it has held up very well. The net is now showing signs of wear, but that is partially because my son decided to snip a piece of net after winning a "tournament."
customer_reviews.author: IAmomof2

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Can be moved from room to room. Our 6 year old plays with it almost daily since Christmas. Awesome toy for the price. It’s an indoor basketball game that comes with a smaller version of a regular rubber inflatable basketball (not foam) so of course it’s noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grown son. He loves it. My only criticism is that there is minimal cushion behind the backboard so if the ball hits it, it echoes through the house. Not a major issue, just didnt think about that issue when I ordered. The backboard is plexiglass, so it can take a lot of punishment and can be moved easily.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Reed

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down big-time over the years!!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew got one of these basketball goals for Christmas a few years ago. The backboard begin to crack a little bit so we decided to replace. Let's just say I was mega disappointed with what I received. For one the basketball itself is like a rubber kickball. The backboard is way weaker. The older model had eight loops to hold the net on this one only has six. All around disappointed with this goal. If you're looking to replace an older model be prepared for disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Caution, may break!
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of these goals and both broke because of the kids dunking on the goal! Only use with kids who cannot reach the rim or dunk!!!! I was able to find a piece of wood to replace the backboard and it is a big improvement! Great idea, but not for the overly aggressive child who tries to dunk like an NBA star!
customer_reviews.author: AH0305

customer_reviews.title: Kobe would be proud of this item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I'm a physical education teacher and have to teach online basketball somehow. Its easy to assemble, feels and looks great, and brings a ball. Most importantly though, THIS THING IS SO MUCH FUN. Been playing with it for hours and had to leave a review because this is the best thing I've bought under twenty dollars in years. I feel like a kid again. Ball it up people. RIP Kobe (PS I hung it on my window but doors would work just fine)
customer_reviews.author: Brian Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a Month
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old (who is not big for his age) used the hoop for about a month. He loved it, but it was short-lived. He was playing with it and dunked on it (which he had done many times before that) and the rim completely broke off from the backboard. I'm sure he wasn't gentle, but I know he wasn't hanging on it. I guess I would have thought they would make it with 'dunking' in mind when it comes to durability. We will try a different brand and update this review if it had better durability.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Calabrese

product_meta.title: SKLZ Pro Mini Basketball Hoop
product_meta.description: The SKLZ Pro Mini XL Basketball Hoop is the perfect way to practice your 3 pointers or free throws without committing to a full game on the court. With a shatterproof backboard, and ultra-durable, 8-loop net, it can handle the swoosh of powerful athletes, and the rough and tumble play of kids. Set it up in your bedroom, basement, playroom, or at the office. With over the door hooks, you can guarantee easy set up for fun, no hassle shots. The foam padding behind the shatterproof polycarbonate backboard and metal brackets reduce noise, so you can shoot hoops anytime of the day or night without the worry of bothering your neighbors, parents, or coworkers. Keep kids active indoors, or take a few shots during the day between meetings or classes. The professional grade basketball hoop with a breakaway rim allows for slam dunks, layups, bank shots, and more. You can be sure that your fun will last, with easy and quick set up. The SKLZ Pro Mini XL Basketball Hoop package includes a 23”x 16" clear polycarbonate backboard, padded brackets that hook over your doorframe, a 5.5” Pro Mini rubber basketball, a 9.5” diameter spring action break-away steel rim, and a wrench. Set up and start shooting baskets in a matter of minutes. With the SKLZ Pro Mini XL Basketball Hoop you can ensure hours of fun with your kids, friends, coworkers, or family. SKLZ is committed to bringing fun to your life with high quality sporting equipment for basketball lovers of every level. "
feature_bullets: Includes pro-grade, spring-action break-away rim for slammin'
Includes 5" diameter Pro Mini Hoop Basketball
